ARTICLE.TITLE: Night Terrace – John Richards
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Night Terrace – John Richards

Luke & Cam are joined by one of the creative forces behind Night Terrace, John Richards.

The popular comedy science fiction audio drama Night Terrace, about a time travelling home from the suburbs, is returning and we met with writer John Richards to talk about its popularity, the BBC getting involved in airing it in the UK and the Kickstarter campaign for Season 3 which is already almost half completed only a few days in.

We also find out all about the Bendigo International Short Film Festival and Competition that John is running this year and is looking for brand new talent, who knows maybe even you could win big with one of the competitions only needing your phone and the word “Bendigo”. You will need to listen to find out how to enter as time is running out the take part.

Big personalities for those with big appetites.

Tune in to Big Breakfast every Monday from 6:30 am. Like us on Facebook & Instagram and be sure to subscribe and rate this podcast.
